test: It's a common idea that a comma indicates a pause where a reader or speaker should take a breath, simply adding commas when you feel a break is needed is not a reliable way to make sure you're punctuating your sentences correctly.Prior to today I had never been to a Write The Docs conference.I do not think it is going to work.
expected: It's a common idea that a comma indicates a pause where a reader or speaker should take a breath. Simply adding commas when you feel a break is needed is not a reliable way to make sure you're punctuating your sentences correctly.Before today I had never been to a Write The Docs conference.I don't think it's going to work.
